name: Hanya
story: One of the judges of the Xianzhou Luofu's Ten-Lords Commission.Ordained by the Ten-Lords and wielding the authority of the Oracle Brush, she reads the multitudes of human sins and transgressions, then issues punishments and karmic retribution.

skills.name: Oracle Brush
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single enemy.

skills.name: Samsara, Locked
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to a single enemy and applies Burden to them. For every 2 Basic ATKs, Skills, or Ultimates allies use on an enemy with Burden, allies recover 1 Skill Point.

skills.name: Ten-Lords' Decree, All Shall Obey
skills.description: Increases an ally's SPD and ATK.

skills.name: Sanction
skills.description: Ally deals more DMG when attacking enemies inflicted with Burden.

skills.name: Netherworld Judgment
skills.description: Attacks the enemy. After entering battle, applies Burden equivalent to that applied by the Skill to a random enemy.

eidolons.name: One Heart
eidolons.description: When an ally with Hanya's Ultimate's effect defeats an enemy, Hanya's action is Advanced Forward by 15%. This effect can only be triggered 1 time(s) per turn.

eidolons.name: Two Views
eidolons.description: After using the Skill, this character's SPD increases by 20% for 1 turn(s).

eidolons.name: Three Temptations
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Four Truths
eidolons.description: The Ultimate's duration is additionally extended for 1 turn(s).

eidolons.name: Five Skandhas
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Six Reverences
eidolons.description: Increase the DMG Boost effect of the Talent by an additional 10%.
